alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Interior York; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 16 at 10:36PM EST until December 18 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow. Additional snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches for a storm total of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland, Interior Waldo, Kennebec, androscoggin, and Interior York Counties. * WHEN...Until Midnight EST Saturday Night. * IMPACTS...A snowstorm will bring plowable snow to the region with a period of moderate travel impacts expected. Periods of moderate snow and low visibility will be the biggest hazards. Heavy, wet snow at times may lead to downed tree limbs, resulting in power outages.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
